name: What open-source game development can teach you about autonomous worlds
description: This talk will look at some successes and hardships of 0 A.D. development and how this can inform future autonomous world development. In particular, discussions over ownership (both dev and user), cheating, modding, customisation, handling a community, internal and external communication.
